thread.title: Rosmah's aide has selective amnesia, says Yeo
thread.title_full: Rosmah's aide has selective amnesia, says Yeo

title: Rosmah's aide has selective amnesia, says Yeo
text:
More 
Damansara Utama assemblyperson Yeo Bee Yin has described the prime minister's wife Rosmah Mansor's aide Rizal Mansor as having "selective amnesia". 
This was after Rizal claimed Yeo and other DAP leaders who visited Permata last October were satisfied and that critics of the early childhood programme should consult the delegation on their experience. 
"He seems to have selective memory on what we discussed during the several public exchanges we had on Permata. 
During the visit, we made it clear that Permata's programmes need to be under full ministries, especially the Women's Ministry, instead of under the Prime Minister's Department (PMD)," Yeo said in a statement today.
